name: 書報討論
goals: The course aims to develop students’ abilities on database search, papers reading, and oral presentation. The students will also be inspired by the academic research while listen to peers reports and discussion.
syllabus:
16 + 2 weeks

Week 1    Introduction

Week 2    Search for papers & choose the paper  

Week 3    Read the paper & write the abstract of presentation

Week 4    Prepare Powerpoint slides

Week 5    Presentation skills 

Week 6    Presentation I   

Week 7    Presentation II

Week 8    Presentation III

Week 9    Presentation IV 

Week 10  Presentation V    

Week 11  Presentation VI      

Week 12  Presentation V II    

Week 13  Presentation VIII     

Week 14  Presentation IX        

Week 15  Presentation X

Week 16  Presentation XI

Week 17  Self-directed learning I

Week 18 Self-directed learning II

methodologies.note: In the first five weeks, information with regards to course introduction, literatures search, papers reading, abstract writing, slides preparation, and oral presentation will be conveyed. Later on, students will perform the oral presentation based on the paper they choose and these skills have been instructed.
While students present the papers, the others will discuss the topic and raise some questions based on the presentation.

grading.note: The assignment is an abstract so as to show the comprehension on the reading material.
The presence/absence and class discussion could indicate the students’participation.
The grade will heavily base on the oral report to examine whether or not the students completely understand and execute the principle of seminar.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
